name: Grow (itch) (raespark)
description:
Everyone needs a relaxing walk through a forest sometimes. Join leaf on her short journey to find her budding sapling a proper home.

Made for the Extra Credits Holiday 2018 Game Jam. 

The Theme was "Present" which I applied to my game in a few different ways. Primarily I wanted to encourage the player to live in the present moment, and relax and feel peace. I also took it as being "physically present" which the main character (Leaf)'s physical presence causes plants around her to spring to life. It's also applied to the fact that she's trying to give the sapling she carries the gift of a permanent proper home in a clearing in the forest to help the forest continue to thrive.
